Description:
Detects any assembly DLL being loaded by an Office Product

Author: Antonlovesdnb
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DotNET Assembly DLL Loaded Via Office Application
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\excel.exe' or process_path like '%\mspub.exe' or process_path like '%\onenote.exe' or process_path like '%\onenoteim.exe' or process_path like '%\outlook.exe' or process_path like '%\powerpnt.exe' or process_path like '%\winword.exe') and image_loaded like 'c:\windows\assembly\%'
